name: DotNetCoreInstaller
description: Acquires a specific version of .NET Core from internet or the tools cache and adds it to the PATH. Use this task to change the version of .NET Core used in subsequent tasks.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: packageType
inputs.label: Package to install
inputs.helpMarkDown: Please select whether to install only runtime or full SDK.

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Specify exact version of .NET Core SDK or runtime to install.
Find the value of `version-sdk` for installing SDK, or `version-runtime` for installing Runtime from any releases [here](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/release-notes/releases.json)

messages.ImplicitVersionNotSupported: Version should be a valid and explicit version: %s
messages.getMachinePlatformFailed: Failed to get machine platform details. Error: %s.
messages.UsingCachedTool: Cached copy of .NET Core exists. No need to install afresh. Cached tool location: %s.
messages.CheckingToolCache: Checking if a cached copy exists for this version...
messages.InstallingAfresh: Cache does not contains this particular .NET Core. Will be downloaded and installed.
messages.GettingDownloadUrl: Getting URL to download .NET Core %s version: %s.
messages.CouldNotDetectPlatform: Could not detect the machine's OS
messages.NullDownloadUrls: Could not construct download URL. Please ensure that specified version %s is valid.
messages.VersionNotFound: Could not fetch download information for version %s. Please check if the version specified is correct. You can refer https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/release-notes/releases.json
messages.CouldNotDownload: Could not download installation package from this URL: %s Error: %s
messages.FailedToDownloadPackage: Failed to download package for installation
